mil7.3.10:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo matena kuṇapena saddhiṁ na saṁvasati;
mil7.3.10:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, samuddassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.10:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, samuddassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.10:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo mahantehi mahābhūtehi saddhiṁ saṁvasati;
mil7.3.10:3.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena appicchaṁ santuṭṭhaṁ dhutavādaṁ sallekhavuttiṁ ācārasampannaṁ lajjiṁ pesalaṁ garuṁ
mil7.3.10:3.2_2: bhāvanīyaṁ vattāraṁ vacanakkhamaṁ codakaṁ pāpagarahiṁ ovādakaṁ anusāsakaṁ viññāpakaṁ sandassakaṁ samādapakaṁ
mil7.3.10:3.2_3: samuttejakaṁ sampahaṁsakaṁ kalyāṇamittaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ nissāya vasitabbaṁ.
mil7.3.10:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.10:4.1_1: mahāsamuddo navasalilasampuṇṇāhi gaṅgāyamunāaciravatīsarabhūmahīādīhi nadīsatasahassehi antalikkhe saliladhārāhi ca pūritopi sakaṁ velaṁ nātivattati;
mil7.3.10:4.2_1: yoginā yogāvacarena lābhasakkārasilokavandanamānanapūjanakāraṇā jīvitahetupi sañcicca sikkhāpadavītikkamo na karaṇīyo.
mil7.3.10:4.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.3.10:6.1_1: mahāsamuddo sabbasavantīhi gaṅgāyamunāaciravatīsarabhūmahīhi antalikkhe udakadhārāhipi na paripūrati;
mil7.3.10:6.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, mahāsamuddassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
